title: The PC suite installation program do not auto-paly after WiMAX Stick is plugged into PC
answer:
(1)Check if the PC supports USB protocol 2.0
(2)Re-plug WiMAX Stick into another USB port
(3)Connect WiMAX Stick to PC directly, or change the USB line connected to PC and WiMAX Stick
(4)If there is a new CD ROM in "My Computer" after WiMAX Stick was plugged, just double click the CD ROM (or right click and select autoplay) to enable autoplay function, then the installation will begin
